item.title: 印度最大垃圾债券面临债权人要求推迟发行
item.description: 印度有史以来规模最大的高收益卢比公司债券由多家全球私人信贷基金持有，这使印度信贷市场的小部分压力成为焦点。【原文：India’s biggest ever high-yield rupee corporate bond, held by a number of global private credit funds, is casting a spotlight on pockets of stress within the nation’s credit markets.】

item.title: 天气再次影响作物生长，大米反弹至 15 年高点
item.description: 天气再次扰乱了大米市场，使这种主食的价格在平静一段时间后又回到了 15 年高点的边缘。【原文：Weather is rattling the rice market once more, driving prices of the food staple back to the cusp of 15-year highs after a period of calm.】

item.title: Cardi B 代言的辣酱面促使韩国股票大涨 30
item.description: 韩国一家方便面生产商周五公布了好于预期的收益，说唱歌手卡迪-B（Cardi B）最近在社交媒体上介绍的一款产品帮助该公司股价大涨，突破了日涨幅限制。【原文：A South Korean instant noodle maker’s stock jumped by their daily limit Friday after posting better-than-expected earnings with help from a product recently featured on social media by rapper Cardi B.】

item.title: 圣米格尔首席执行官称 "没问题"，外汇损失冲击第一季度利润
item.description: 菲律宾销售额最大的企业集团生力公司总裁周五对公司今年下半年的盈利前景充满信心，此前外汇兑换损失严重影响了公司第一季度的利润。【原文：The president of San Miguel Corp., the Philippines’ largest conglomerate by sales, on Friday struck a confident tone on the company’s earnings prospects for the rest of the year, after foreign exchange losses weighed heavily on first-quarter profit.】

item.title: 南非将实现 15 年来首次基本预算盈余
item.description: 南非很可能在 15 年来首次实现基本预算盈余（收入超过非利息支出），这将使其走上阻止债务进一步增长的道路，而债务的增长速度已经高得令人担忧。【原文：South Africa likely achieved a primary budget surplus — where revenue exceeds non-interest expenditure — for the first time in 15 years, setting it on a path to arrest further growth in debt that’s already worryingly high.】

item.title: 摩根资产重启以政府为重点的货币市场基金
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s asset management arm has created a new European money market fund focused on public debt, a kind of investment that largely disappeared when interest rates were negative.】

item.title: 法国失业率仍为 7.5%，马克龙遭遇挫折
item.description: 法国今年第一季度的失业率稳定在 7.5%，这凸显了埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统在展示其不受欢迎的劳动力市场改革仍在取得成效方面所面临的挑战。【原文：French unemployment held steady at 7.5% in the first quarter of the year, highlighting the challenge President Emmanuel Macron faces to show his unpopular labor-market reforms are still getting results.】

item.title: 高盛资深对冲基金将在恒基兆业广场开设香港办事处
item.description: 一家由前高盛集团董事总经理创建的新亚洲对冲基金公司将在恒基兆业广场开设香港办事处。【原文：A new Asia hedge fund firm created by a former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. managing director will open its Hong Kong office at The Henderson.】

item.title: 中国取消个人购房贷款利率下限
item.description: 中国取消了房贷利率下限，并降低了个人购房者的最低首付比例，这是为支撑陷入困境的房地产市场而采取的最严厉举措。【原文：China removed the floor on mortgage rates and lowered the minimum down payment ratios for individual homebuyers in its most drastic move to shore up the beleaguered property market.】

item.title: 土耳其与比亚迪和奇瑞就电动汽车工厂举行 "高级 "会谈
item.description: 土耳其正在与中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司和奇瑞汽车股份有限公司就在该国投资建厂进行深入谈判，这一举措将有助于这两家公司提高在欧洲的销量。【原文：Turkey is in advanced negotiations with Chinese electric vehicle manufacturers BYD Co. and Chery Automobile Co Ltd. for factory investments in the country, a step that could help the companies boost sales to Europe.】

item.title: 外国人因大选风险和中国吸引力抛售印度股票
item.description: 由于大选的不确定性和高估值促使一些基金转向中国股票等更便宜的替代品，印度股市将出现近一年来最大的月度资金外流。【原文：Indian stocks are set for the biggest monthly outflow in nearly a year as election uncertainties and high valuations prompt some funds to shift to cheaper alternatives like Chinese equities.】

item.title: 中国铝冶炼厂因需求旺盛而提高产量至创纪录水平
item.description: 中国的铝产量攀升至创纪录水平，以满足强劲的需求，因为制造业和出口为中国今年日益失衡的经济复苏提供了动力。【原文：China’s aluminum output climbed to a record to feed robust demand as manufacturing and exports power the country’s increasingly unbalanced economic recovery this year.】

item.title: 大多数日本公司称日元疲软损害利润：调查
item.description: 根据最近的一项调查，大多数日本公司认为日元最近的疲软对其业务是一个不利因素。【原文：A majority of Japanese companies considers the yen’s recent weakness a negative factor for their businesses, according to a recent survey.】

item.title: 派拉蒙惨败给所有人上了一堂关于投资者不平等的课
item.description:
围绕好莱坞制片厂的传奇故事应该让投资者看到，在控股股东可以出售股份的情况下，投资者应该要求得到更好的保护。【原文：

The saga around the Hollywood studio should see investors demand better protection in situations where controlling shareholders can sell out. 

】

item.title: 诺贝尔经济学奖得主萨金特称欧盟联合债务是一个滑坡
item.description: 诺贝尔经济学奖获得者托马斯-萨金特（Thomas J. Sargent）说，一些欧洲国家担心发行共同债务来加强国防是走向更大联合的滑坡，这种担心是合理的。【原文：It’s fair for some European countries to fear that issuing common debt to bolster defense is a slippery slope to greater union, Nobel prize-winning economist Thomas J. Sargent said.】

item.title: 中国专项债券销售需求与 2024 年趋势一致
item.description: 中国以 30 年期国债拍卖拉开了今年特别主权债券发行的序幕，吸引了 3.9 倍于发行量的需求。【原文：China kicked off issuance of this year’s special sovereign bonds with a 30-year auction that drew demand of 3.9 times the amount on offer.】

item.title: 恒天然有意出售资产，新西兰农民有望获得意外之财
item.description: 如果恒天然合作集团（Fonterra Cooperative Group）实施退出其全球消费业务的计划，新西兰奶农可能会获得丰厚的回报。【原文：New Zealand dairy farmers could be in for a big pay day if Fonterra Cooperative Group follows through on plans to exit its global consumer businesses.】

item.title: 供应风险加剧，中国最大铜矿商将提高产量
item.description: 在铜价因预期赤字而向创纪录水平反弹之际，中国领先的铜矿商上调了产量指导。【原文：China’s leading copper miner raised its output guidance at a time when prices have been rallying toward a record on expected deficits.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称七月不需要减息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔警告说，不要在 6 月和 7 月连续降息。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel warned against back-to-back interest-rate cuts in June and July.】

item.title: 尽管越南政局动荡，投资者仍对其趋之若鹜
item.description: 在过去几年里，越南的反贪腐运动已经让包括国家主席、副总理和政治局委员在内的一大批共产党高层领导落马。但这并没有阻止外国投资者的资金流入。【原文：Over the past few years, Vietnam’s anti-graft drive has taken down a slew of top Communist Party leaders, including presidents, deputy prime ministers and Politburo members. But that hasn’t stopped foreign investors from pouring in cash.】

item.title: 中国房价加速下跌，但仍在努力回暖
item.description: 4 月份，中国房价下跌速度加快，凸显了政府加大力度解决多年来房地产危机的原因。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a faster pace in April, underscoring why the government is stepping up efforts to tackle the years-long property crisis.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金将CPI后美元下跌作为买入机会
item.description: 据交易员称，亚洲的宏观基金利用美元周四下跌的机会买入美元，尤其是对日元。【原文：Macro funds in Asia used the dollar’s drop Thursday as an opportunity to buy it, in particular against the yen, according to traders.】

item.title: 中国房地产股因希望获得更多政策支持而反弹
item.description: 中国房地产开发商的股票延续涨势，因为投资者预计中国政府将在周五的会议后推出更多政策支持，以挽救陷入困境的市场。【原文：Shares of Chinese property developers extended a rally as investors expect Beijing to unveil more policy support after a Friday meeting to salvage the beleaguered market.】

item.title: 格拉斯-刘易斯建议赫斯投资者支持雪佛龙交易
item.description: 代理顾问 Glass Lewis & Co. 建议赫斯公司的投资者投票赞成雪佛龙公司 530 亿美元的收购要约。【原文：Proxy adviser Glass Lewis & Co. advised Hess Corp. investors to vote in favor of the oil company’s $53 billion buyout offer from Chevron Corp.】

item.title: 中国反弹后投资者青睐印度债券
item.description: 今年，印度债券的收益已经超过了中国债券，而且有理由认为这种超额收益还将继续。【原文：Gains from Indian bonds have surpassed those on Chinese debt this year and there are reasons to suggest the outperformance will continue.】

item.title: Jefferies 风险经理对 Archegos 的现金请求表示反对："有什么紧急情况？
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）的一位风险经理想知道，为什么她在 Archegos 的联系人似乎急于从交易账户中提取数亿美元的超额现金。【原文：A Jefferies Financial Group risk manager wondered why her contact at Archegos seemed to be in such a rush to withdraw hundreds of millions of dollars in excess cash from its trading account.】

item.title: 中国房市崩盘可能导致数百万前途无量的职业生涯倒退
item.description:
本以为已经在中产阶级崛起的过程中赢得一席之地的专业人士，现在却在找工作，勉强度日。【原文：

Professionals who thought they’d won a secure place in the rising middle class are now looking for work and scraping by.

】

item.title: 白银成为炙手可热的大宗商品，需求和赤字推动白银反弹
item.description: 黄金创纪录的涨势可能是今年的头条新闻，但白银的涨势更猛、更快，因为这种不那么迷人的金属受益于强劲的金融和工业需求。【原文：Gold’s record-setting rally may have captured the headlines this year, but it’s silver that’s running harder and faster as the less glamorous metal benefits from robust financial and industrial demand.】
